result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn R. Hunter was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine [Modifiers: Repeater], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Absolute sobriety from controlled substances unless prescribed and only within the prescribed amounts.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as recommended. 

AODA and follow up. 

DNA sample. 

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Case Called: 9:09 am
INCLUDES 22CF839, 22CF980, 22CF1221.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher in person:
Defendant appears in custody, in person, and with Atty Joseph Kaupie in person;
VRCW. 
PRELIMINARY HEARING IN 22CF839:
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information to be E-filed.  Reading Waived. Parties are to proceed to Plea Hearing at this time.

PLEA HEARING IN ALL FILES:
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. State moves to:
22CF980:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>>DRI.

22CF1221:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (Resisting or Obstructing an Officer-Repeater)>>DRI.

COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
22CF839:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  
Defendant makes statements.

COURT ORDERS: 
22CF839:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless prescribed and only within the prescribed amounts, AODA and Follow up, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Court finds 0 Days Credit.
